snippet.title: Roid Rage Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
GET THE GAME ALREADY! https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.bscotch.roid

Dodge asteroids, crash repeatedly, and watch your pilot die!

Use your spongy thumbs to pilot a ship with no brakes through an asteroid field as you struggle to collect JUICE, a space-age commodity. 

== FEATURES ==
- Easy to play, insanely difficult. Like Flappy Bird, except less terrible.
- 4 Ships to earn, each with its own power-up
- BscotchID integration - make friends, earn cross-game rewards, and join the community (if you don't have one, get one here http://id.bscotch.net/register/)
Grab the game for free, give it a test-pilot, and join our ever-growing fan base!

== About the Studio ==
Butterscotch Shenanigans is an indie studio of three brothers. As a studio we focus on making punchy games that deliver a robust, player-focused experience to make you happy at any point in the day. We continually experiment with new monetization models and community growth to create a one-stop shop to fulfill all your mobile gaming dreams. Feel free to reach out to us on twitter, @bscotchshenani, or send a note to our support@butterscotch-shenanigans.com account. You can also follow our thoughts and new game developments on the blog, butterscotch-shenanigans.com.
